root.name: Dexter
root.description: Overview Dexter: the video game is based on the Showtime Original series of the same name. In the game you play as Dexter Morgan, your everyday, run of the mill blood splatter analyst, who just happens to be a serial killer by night. The game puts you in control of Dexter as you balance his day and night life. Aid in analyzing crime scenes, gathering evidence and solving crimes by day, while choosing victims and using stealth gameplay to stalk your prey at night. Should your victims be left to the courts or put through your ritual. The choice is up to you.
